Waduh! Pria Ini Tewas Saat Ikut Tantangan Makan Telur Mentah Terbanyak
05 Nov 2019, 08:35 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Seorang pria di India meninggal, setelah ia ikut tantangan makan telur terbanyak. Nyawanya tak tertolong ketika ia berusaha menghabiskan 50 telur mentah.Subhash Yadav, menerima tantangan dari temannya untuk menyantap 50 butir telur, dalam waktu singkat ketika mereka berada di Pasar Bibiganj, di Uttar Pradesh, India. Saat itu Subhash ditantang oleh salah satu temannya, untuk menyantap 50 telur mentah dalam waktu singkat, di mana pemenang akan mendapatkan uang sebanyak Rs 2,000 (Rp 396,080).Baca Juga: Seram! Kompetisi Makan Ini Berujung dengan Kematian Tragis


Foto: Istimewa

Dilansir dari Daily Mail UK (05/11), pria berusia 42 tahun itu mulai menyantap telur dalam waktu singkat. Ia menerima tantangan tersebut, dan ia berhasil menelan total 41 butir telur mentah.Namun, ketika ia akan menelan telur yang ke-42 tiba-tiba Yadav langsung ambruk, dan tak sadarkan diri. Yadav langsung dilarikan ke rumah sakit terdekat, sebelum dirujuk ke Sanjay Gandhi Post Graduate Institute of Medical Sciences di mana ia menghembuskan nafas terakhirnya di sana.Menurut penjelasan dokter yang menangani Yadav, ia meninggal karena komplikasi menyantap terlalu banyak telur mentah. Pihak keluarga Yadav belum memberikan tanggapan tentang kejadian tragis ini.


Foto: Istimewa

Kejadian seperti ini bukan yang pertama kalinya terjadi. Sebelumnya, banyak orang yang meninggal setelah mengikuti kompetisi makanan yang terlalu banyak dan berlebihan.Seperti yang pernah terjadi di Jepang, seorang pria meninggal dunia setelah memasukkan lima buah onigiri ke dalam mulutnya. Ouch! This man was killed while taking part in the challenge of eating the most raw eggs
05 Nov 2019, 08:35 by Sonia Basoni - detikFood


Photo: Special

Jakarta - A man in India died, after he joined the challenge of eating the most eggs. His life was saved when he tried to finish 50 raw eggs. Subhash Yadav, accepting the challenge from his friend to eat 50 eggs, in a short time when they were at the Bibiganj Market, in Uttar Pradesh, India. At that time Subhash was challenged by one of his friends, to eat 50 raw eggs in a short amount of time, where the winner will get as much as Rs 2,000 (Rp. 396,080). Also Read: Spooky! This Eating Competition ends in a tragic death


Photo: Special

Reporting from the UK Daily Mail (05/11), the 42-year-old man began to eat eggs in a short time. He accepted the challenge, and he managed to swallow a total of 41 raw eggs. However, when he was about to swallow the 42nd egg Yadav suddenly collapsed, and was unconscious. Yadav was immediately rushed to the nearest hospital, before being referred to the Sanjay Gandhi Post Graduate Institute of Medical Sciences where he breathed his last there. According to the explanation of the doctor who handled Yadav, he died from complications from eating too many raw eggs. The Yadav family has not yet responded to this tragic event.


Photo: Special

Events like this are not the first time this has happened. Previously, many people died after participating in too many and excessive food competitions. Like what had happened in Japan, a man died after putting five onigiri in his mouth. In addition there are also people who died after the fastest chicken eating contest, to death after the pancake eating contest.
